channel.title: devops on Yak Shaving
channel.description: Recent content in devops on Yak Shaving

item.title: Virtual Machine Files
item.description: Virtual machine itself consists of multiple files that reside on the data store itself. Global virtual machine files.

item.title: Limit CPU Features to Virtual Machine
item.description: You can mask some of the CPU features to not be exposed to the virtual machine; a common example is “AMD No eXecute (NX)” and “Intel eXecute Disable (XD)”.

item.title: What Is Esxi Host
item.description: ESXi host is the actual physical server that the virtual machines will run on. ESXi is the operating system that we install on this physical server.

item.title: Software Defined Data Center SDDC
item.description: What is software-defined data center? The software-defined data center approach extends industry-leading virtualization beyond computing, network and storage, making data center services painless in terms of configuration and managing virtual machines.

item.title: Working With Plugins Scripted Jenkins
item.description: List all of the plugins you have in your instance We will need to use for loop to iterate over the list of Jenkins.

item.title: NotSerializableException scripted Jenkins
item.description: If you receive NotSerializableException, in your scripted pipeline or share library, there are couple of reasons:

item.title: Continuation Passing Style (CPS)
item.description: The scenario when you call a function but also pass another function that is to be executed when the input/output operation is finished, can be considered a case of continuation passing style (CPS)

item.title: Parameterize Jenkins pipeline
item.description: Say you need to have a parameter represents the branch so the developer can execute the build against a branch of their choice
